name: CyberSecurityToday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Updates on the latest cyber security threats to businesses, data breach disclosures, and how you can secure your firm in an increasingly risky time. Ransomware is on the rise, data breaches are affecting everyone, and government regulations are becoming more strict. Stay on top of it all with our host Howard Solomon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
